item.title: Comcast Business IPv6 Prefix Notes
item.description: original post by John Burwell can be found here Here are my notes from this weekend’s IPv6 prefix exhaustion experiment. Comcast delegates to my router a /59 prefix, instead of a /60. This is unexpected, but it’s okay, because one /59 is two /60s. A two-fer. On the one hand, if you have only one router, this is a limitation; out of the /56 allocated to your account, there are 8 /59s, with only the two /60s per /59.
